name: CVE-2008-6145
description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in the WEC Discussion Forum (wec_discussion) extension 1.7.0 and earlier for TYPO3 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:wec_discussion_forum:1.6.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:wec_discussion_forum:1.6:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:wec_discussion_forum:1.6.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:wec_discussion_forum:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:wec_discussion_forum:1.6.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:wec_discussion_forum:1.6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:typo3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
